attributes.title: VALORANT
attributes.description:
## Tactical Shooter Meets Unique Agent Abilities

VALORANT is a free-to-play first-person tactical hero shooter developed and published by Riot Games.

**Key Features:**
- Precise gunplay with tactical gameplay
- Unique agents with special abilities
- Competitive 5v5 matches
- Anti-cheat system built from the ground up
- Regular content updates
attributes.systemRequirements:
**Minimum Requirements:**
- OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
- Processor: Intel i3-4150
- Memory: 4 GB RAM
- Graphics: GeForce GT 730
- Network: Broadband Internet connection
- Storage: 8 GB available space
